headline: Hasbro (HAS) Laps the Stock Market: Here's Why
summary: Hasbro (HAS) closed at $86.89 in the latest trading session, marking a +1.72% move from the prior day.

headline: Galaxy Gaming® to Showcase Monopoly and Yahtzee Reimagined for Table Games at ICE 2026
summary: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Galaxy Gaming, Inc. (OTC: GLXZ), the world’s largest independent developer and distributor of casino table games and technology, is set to make a bold statement at this year’s International Casinos Exhibition (ICE) Barcelona, taking place January 19-21 at stand 3T44.
